bibl.title: The Idalion-Petreres Ptolemaic Hoard.
bibl.note: Cyprus Museum, Inv. 1944/XII-9/1. Nine silver Ptolemaic tetradrachms in a small pot, and one Ptolemaic bronze in the soil nearby (164/3-107/6 B.C.).
bibl.seg: Nicolaou Ino, The Idalion-Petreres Ptolemaic Hoard.
Cyprus Museum, Inv. 1944/XII-9/1. Nine silver Ptolemaic tetradrachms in a small pot, and one Ptolemaic bronze in the soil nearby (164/3-107/6 B.C.).
